name: React
description: The library for building web and native user interfaces. React is component-based and highly efficient.

name: Next.js
description: A React framework for building server-side rendered and statically generated web applications.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs without leaving your HTML.

name: JavaScript
description: The programming language of the web, used to make websites interactive and dynamic.

name: Python
description: A versatile, high-level programming language widely used for web development, data science, and automation.

name: TypeScript
description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and better tooling for large-scale applications.
